contactSanCarlosTitle: The Art of Healing San Carlos
contactCommunityText: We are here to answer your questions and accompany you on your healing journey. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or if you would like more information about our ceremonies. Join our community and share experiences with people seeking a path of well-being and spiritual growth!
preparationCtaDescription: The path to healing begins long before the ceremony. Discover how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit to make the most of your experience with Ayahuasca.

ayahuascaInfoTitle: Ancestral Medicine: What is Ayahuasca and How Does It Work?
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of two sacred plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, indigenous communities have used it in ceremonies as a tool for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing, as well as for deep self-knowledge.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca acts on the central nervous system, inducing altered states of consciousness that allow access to deep layers of the subconscious. During the experience, it is common to have visions, release suppressed emotions, and gain a clearer understanding of one's life path. The medicine acts as a purifying agent, cleansing the body and spirit of negative energies and emotional blockages.
spiritualMasterTitle: A Spiritual Master, Not a Drug
spiritualMasterDescription: It is important to understand that Ayahuasca is not a recreational drug, but a spiritual master plant that demands respect, intention, and proper guidance. Each ceremony is a sacred ritual led by an experienced guide who ensures a safe and contained environment for participants to navigate their inner journey with confidence and support.
benefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of purpose and a clearer direction in their lives.
benefitHealingDescription: Helps release deep traumas, anxieties, and patterns that limit your well-being.
benefitConnectionDescription: Fosters a deep connection with nature, the universe, and your own divine essence.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where the energy of the group enhances individual healing. A space of support and collective connection.
privateCeremonyDescription: A personalized and intimate process, focused on your specific needs, with the exclusive dedication of the guide.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your healing journey with respect, care, and deep wisdom.
editGuideDescription: Make changes to the guide's information.
deleteGuideConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone and the guide will be permanently removed.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to view our ceremony plans, book your spot, and begin your journey of transformation.
processSectionTitle: Our Process: From Preparation to Integration
preparationProcessDescription: We guide you on how to prepare your body and mind before the ceremony.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where you will experience the medicine under our care.
experienceProcessDescription: You will live a deep journey of introspection and connection.
integrationProcessDescription: We help you understand and apply the lessons learned in your daily life.
dietTitle: Sacred Diet: Nourishing Body and Spirit
dietSubtitle: A proper diet is essential to prepare your body and maximize the benefits of the medicine.
prohibitedFoodsTitle: Foods to Avoid (at least 3 days before)
mentalPrepSubtitle: The journey begins within. We suggest these practices to open your heart and mind.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. A clear intention guides the experience.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and emotions. It is a powerful tool for self-awareness.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony is a safe space to confront and release deep emotions. It is normal to experience a wide range of feelings, from joy to sadness. Allow yourself to feel without judgment, trusting that everything that emerges is part of your healing process. Our team will be there to support you at all times, providing containment and loving support.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: We recommend bringing items that provide you with comfort and help you connect with your intention.
comfortItemsList: A personal sacred object (amulet, crystal, photo)
